title: Sanntid Oslo Android Wear
summary: Real-time departure info from Ruter on your Android Wear smartwatch.
description: This app requires an Android Wear Smart Watch 'paired' with your mobile. It shows real time info (departures) on your watch. The stops are configured in settings, on your mobile.Developed by Kantega AS www.kantega.no. Sanntid Oslo contains data under Norwegian license for public data (NLOD) made available by ruter.no.Please note: Sanntid Oslo is a beta version! Contact us if you find any errors.
descriptionHTML:
This app requires an Android Wear Smart Watch 'paired' with your mobile. It shows real time info (departures) on your watch. The stops are configured in settings, on your mobile.

Developed by Kantega AS www.kantega.no. Sanntid Oslo contains data under Norwegian license for public data (NLOD) made available by ruter.no.

Please note: Sanntid Oslo is a beta version! Contact us if you find any errors.
